scenes.background: Monica shifts nervously in her seat, glancing at Bob who now stands with his arms crossed.
scenes.description: 'Bob, it's not just my responsibility. We all agreed to share the workload.'

options.text: Everyone, let's take a step back and calmly discuss how we can better manage this project.
options.analysis: You tried to calm the situation and promote a collaborative approach, demonstrating strong perception and self-regulation.

options.text: Monica, I understand your frustration. Bob, can we redistribute some tasks to help Monica out?
options.analysis: You acknowledged Monica's frustration and sought to reallocate work, demonstrating empathy and social skills.

options.text: Monica, maybe we need to set up a meeting to clarify everyone's responsibilities.
options.analysis: You suggested a structured approach to address the issue, showing social skill but lower empathy and motivation.
